text:
April 13, 1965
Miss Leontine Keane, Director
Radio-TV Publicity
Mass Communications Center
Wayne State University
Detroit, Michigan 48202
Dear Miss Keane:
mxt Newsletter will contain a list of NAEB Committees, and 1 wanted
to let you know why the Public Relations Committee is no longer listed.
There is no doubt that the NAEB needs a well developed PR program, but
this should really be a staff function. I believe you will agree that
a sound Public Relations program cannot be conducted by a committee. If
certain specific matters seem to need committee advice and assistance
(e.g. the present work being done by Lee Campion and Marion Corwell on
a speakers guide), either ad hoc committees, or one or two individuals will
be asked to help out.
X appreciate the very real service this committee has provided in the
face of extreme administrative difficulties, and you may be sure that
I will call upon you again.
Sincerely,
William G. Harley
